thread.title_full: Watch: Code Kunst Drops Teaser For "Fire Water" MV (Featuring G.Soul And Tablo) | Soompi

author: J. K
title: Watch: Code Kunst Drops Teaser For "Fire Water" MV (Featuring G.Soul And Tablo) | Soompi
text:
Shares 207 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Code Kunst has shared a brief glimpse of the music video for his much-anticipated collaboration track! 
On February 23, a teaser video was released for the talented musician’s new track “Fire Water,” which is the title track off his upcoming third studio album entitled “Muggles’ Mansion.” The song features Epik High’s Tablo , and JYP Entertainment’s singer-songwriter G.Soul. Check out the mesmerizing teaser video below! 
Code Kunst is signed under HIGHGRND, Tablo’s sub-label under YG Entertainment. His new album features 15 tracks in total, with other collaborating artists including Loco, Mino, Hyukoh’s Oh Hyuk, Lee Hi, Dok2, BewhY, Yang Dong Geun, Suran, and many more. “Muggles’ Mansion,” as well as the music video for “Fire Water,” is due out on February 28 at noon KST.
